io.jenkins.plugins.logintheme.LoginTheme.header:
<script>
document.getElementsByTagName('h1')[0].textContent = 'ぽけびあビルドにようこそ！'
</script>
<style>
.simple-page .logo {
        //background-image: url('http://pokepia-buildmachine-1.cocone.jp:8080/userContent/TitleColony.png');
        //background-image: url('https://www.jenkins.io/images/logos/snow/snow.png');
        background-image: url('https://www.pokepia.jp/sns/ogp.png');
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: 50% 0;
        height: 180px;
        background-size: contain;
    }
    .simple-page form {
        width: unset;
        max-width: unset;
    }
</style>
